content: And he gave it for his opinion, that whosoever could make two ears of corn or two blades of grass to grow upon a spot of ground where only one grew before, would deserve better of mankind, and do more essential service to his country, than the whole race of politicians put together.
translations: ita:Ed egli ha dato la sua opinione, che chiunque potrebbe fare crescere due spighe di grano o due fili d'erba su un pezzo d
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Scott (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
